title: New Company Womens Cupid Valentines Day Hearts Scarf Ð Black Ð One Size.
features: This scarf has a pattern of hearts on a black background! Perfect Valentine'ss Day attire or gift.
Polyester - Made with alternating strips of a very soft, smooth satin-like material and a sheer material of the same color. Not itchy like wool, but rather looks and feels like silk!
Can be worn as a scarf, head wrap, or belt.
